credits: MooMoo Warrior is a fan-made version of MooMoo.io, created due to the growing concerns over hackers and the lack of updates from the original developers. Hope this game can bring a fresh, secure, and continuously evolving experience for all the fans of the original game.

commands.name: kick
commands.title: kick <player id>
commands.desc: Removes a player from the room

commands.name: ban
commands.title: ban <player id>
commands.desc: Removes and prevents a player from joining the room

weapons.name: hand axe
weapons.desc: gathers resources at a higher rate

weapons.name: great axe
weapons.desc: deal more damage and gather more resources

weapons.name: short sword
weapons.desc: increased attack power but slower move speed

weapons.name: stick
weapons.desc: great for gathering but very weak

weapons.name: hunting bow
weapons.desc: bow used for ranged combat and hunting

weapons.name: wooden shield
weapons.desc: blocks projectiles and reduces melee damage

weapons.name: crossbow
weapons.desc: deals more damage and has greater range

weapons.name: repeater crossbow
weapons.desc: high firerate crossbow with reduced damage

weapons.name: musket
weapons.desc: slow firerate but high damage and range

weapons.name: grapple gun
weapons.desc: grab objects, players, and mobs towards you or pull yourself towards them

lists.name: apple
lists.desc: restores 20 health when consumed

lists.name: cookie
lists.desc: restores 40 health when consumed

lists.name: cheese
lists.desc: restores 50 health and another 50 over 5 seconds

lists.name: wood wall
lists.desc: provides protection for your village

lists.name: stone wall
lists.desc: provides improved protection for your village

lists.name: castle wall
lists.desc: provides powerful protection for your village

lists.name: spikes
lists.desc: damages enemies when they touch them

lists.name: greater spikes
lists.desc: damages enemies when they touch them

lists.name: poison spikes
lists.desc: poisons enemies when they touch them

lists.name: spinning spikes
lists.desc: damages enemies when they touch them

lists.name: windmill
lists.desc: generates gold over time

lists.name: faster windmill
lists.desc: generates more gold over time

lists.name: power mill
lists.desc: generates more gold over time

lists.name: pit trap
lists.desc: pit that traps enemies if they walk over it

lists.name: boost pad
lists.desc: provides boost when stepped on

lists.name: mine
lists.desc: allows you to mine stone

lists.name: sapling
lists.desc: allows you to farm wood

lists.name: turret
lists.desc: defensive structure that shoots at enemies

lists.name: platform
lists.desc: platform to shoot over walls and cross over water

lists.name: healing pad
lists.desc: standing on it will slowly heal you

lists.name: blocker
lists.desc: blocks building in radius

lists.name: teleporter
lists.desc: teleports you to a random point on the map

lists.name: spawn pad
lists.desc: you will spawn here when you die but it will dissapear

hats.name: Flipper Hat
hats.desc: provides more control while in water

hats.name: Soldier Helmet
hats.desc: reduces damage taken but slows movement

hats.name: Marksman Cap
hats.desc: reduces the cost of projectiles while increasing projectile speed and range

hats.name: Bull Helmet
hats.desc: increases damage done but drains health

hats.name: Emp Helmet
hats.desc: turrets won't attack, but you move slower

hats.name: Spike Gear
hats.desc: knocks back and deals damage to players that damage you

hats.name: Samurai Armor
hats.desc: increases attack speed and fire rate

hats.name: Dark Knight
hats.desc: restores health when you deal damage

hats.name: Tank Gear
hats.desc: increases damage to buildings but reduces movement speed

hats.name: Helicopter Hat
hats.desc: fly over players and buildings, nothing can stop you... or can it?

hats.name: Assassin Gear
hats.desc: Goes invisible when not moving. Can't eat. Increases movement speed

accessories.name: Blood Wings
accessories.desc: restores health when you deal damage

accessories.name: Silver Wings
accessories.desc: deals damage to players that damage you
